text:
AT&T is holding an info session for their Finance Leadership Development Program Monday, October 9 at 4pm! They are recruiting for both interns and full-time.

This is a great opportunity for anyone looking to do a corporate finance rotational program at a Fortune 30 company (in Dallas, TX).

The event is technically virtual, but we are planning to meet in a TNRB classroom with some type of food (details forthcoming).

Both I and <@U03LXQH03LZ> interned there and are planning to return full-time. We will be at the event to chat with anyone interested.

Register for the event on Handshake! (especially if you want the link to join virtually)

<https://byu.joinhandshake.com/stu/events/1393746?ref=events-search>
